posts.post_content:
THANKS!

For sale - All prices include shipping.  I take PayPal(no fee), checks, money orders and cash.  E-mail [url]hanksta_3@yahoo.com[/url] if interested.

Thanks,
Sean

Donlin - EPDG - No creases/wrinkles, card is VG/EX - SOLD
Titus - Broad Leaf - No creases/wrinkles, card is VG/EX but has period writing on the back, no Broad Leaf graded by SGC - SOLD
Wilhelm - Tolstoi - No creases/wrinkles, card is VG/EX with both Tolstoi and Sweet Cap. wet sheet transfer on front - SOLD
Carr - Cycle - No creases/wrinkles, card is VG/EX - SOLD

[IMG]http://i56.photobucket.com/albums/g193/hanksta3/scan0003-2.jpg[/IMG]

you were faster than me on the Titus-I wanted that for my collection and thought I had it but got a neg email shortly after--VERY GOOD JOB!!!:D

Price lowered on last card.

Sorry about that Jim, I had quick fingers that day.  It should help fill a few holes in my Cravath collection!

Sean

Sean,
Email sent on the Donlin.
Thanks.
RayB
